answers.answer: It's up to what you can handle honey!!
I've always thought 12's were better because you have more time off in between. No matter what, working while pregnant is not easy when you have to be on your feet all day!

I worked in a warehouse and had to stop working at 33 weeks cause my doctor said my feet and legs were swelling excessively and putting my at risk for preeclampsia :/ but I stood on my feet 10 hrs a day

question: Do you think it is better to work 12 hr shifts 2 days then off 2 then work 3 one week then the next week off 2 days work 2 days then off 3 days or work 8 hr shifts& b off way less? Idk the 12 hr days kill me! But I remember how tired I was when I wasn't pregnant& working 8 hr days. I can keep my 12's or go back to 8 hr days I figured 8 hr days would b better once the baby was born because it would b less time at the daycare. HELP! PLEASE!
title: 12 hr shifts or 8?? Help!
